dcterms:creator: K. Han
Y. Huang
S. Gong
Y. Huang
L. Wang
T. Tan
dcterms:description: VCCR is a dataset designed for video-based clothing-change person re-identification, containing 4,384 tracklets with 392 identities, each having 2 to 10 different suits per identity. It poses realistic challenges for Re-ID, including entire clothing changes, viewpoint variations, and occlusions.
dcterms:title: VCCR

dcterms:creator: X. Gu
H. Chang
B. Ma
H. Zhang
X. Chen
dcterms:description: CCVID is a dataset for clothes-changing person re-identification that includes 2,856 tracklets with 226 identities, featuring 2 to 5 different suits per identity. It mimics simplistic Re-ID scenarios with frontal viewpoints, clearly visible faces, and slight clothing changes.
dcterms:title: CCVID
